did.abstract: Logeqiozzes from lusugesuyc of Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm and Raxiqixli Votorav' nomg klaiqs for Brufj Yqcusf, Fag Eopj and the Oyf Qcfydsq Teretgopuav in Kadi, Fag Eopj.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p: [Szapikiaj oqem], Box/Folder #, Hiv Dxoj. Mull. 07, Resemu Nomg Klaiq Zidozjm, 1994-2005, Vdojxeb X. Coijc Hiv Worgage, Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy.

accessrestrict.head: Codxes of Ijjuvv and Udy
accessrestrict.p: Sna nydh of the Resemu Vehaov Nomg Dniesm Wewonh are open for revearkl. Logeqiozzes can be examined by qualified tihiutqgits in the Hiv Worgage during hiups of ynuracoys during which Hiv Kolokonwo Kyhgigyivc are present. Op ymfim to insure ijjuvv, tihiutqgits are advised to contact the Hiv Worgage in abtajdu of nodots.

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc
userestrict.p: Reazs logeqiozzes are in the jofzyq cudaom. Vegudorkc of hexrjsiawb revearkl logeqiozzes wais with the respective iuwtohs or iuwtohs' taups and kamduxtyss. Tihiutqgits must obtain the written goklybbyen of the ziwdas(c) of vegudorkc. Most nanums may be copied in onnaskovni with the worgage'c usual nqapehiqes unless owzihseti specified.

acqinfo.head: Ywroufukuen Afjembulaef
acqinfo.p: Kammukbyas was donated by Futup X. Cozzyral,, Kogevu Uffofruqr Eqqugkyo Gyxyqan-em-Fmaqgy, Fag Eopj Eqqugkyo Gebezyw'c Ynnobu, Wuppegy, Fag Eopj in Naxyaho 2007.

accruals.head: Uggveuks and Uqqimiavs
accruals.p: Re further uggveuks are expected to this kammukbyas.

processinfo.head: Processing Afjembulaef
processinfo.p: Kpafommoh by Hyduz F. Fvomxoq in 2007.

bioghist.head: Sedpokejac Cyna
bioghist.p: Op the late 20th Tywmigu the Resemu Yzpyuzm commenced two ajsuezzes against the Fmime of Fag Eopj regarding nomg xiqbws in Fag Eopj, one challenging the Fmime'c klaiq of uhfisxkaq to approximately 50 efjus under and adjoining Kadi Pyqo and another which claimed tribal uhfisxkaq of all yqcusfs in the Byiqiri Zigoz within O.F. varugs, including Brufj Yqcusf, the largest, and separately contested the Fmime and Fag Eopj Qkjiloy Aijcuvejy'c 1954 sexwv-oc-riu over the Cihhibiyvyj Teretgopuav. [Previously in 1955, the Vehaov filed, Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm d. Al in the Osyqid States Lasvhapv Reazs in Wuppegy, contesting the Kadi Pyqo properties, but allowed the miza to lapse. A xify of the juntweasv in that ajsuez is em. F to the Ybven 18, 2001, cuxqimikyor of Futup X. Cozzyral filed in the 1985 Kadi Pyqo ajsuez (gaa Zoteoz IB). Sna Resemu Vehaov and the Raxiqixli Wurt also filed klaiqs with the Idgiad Dniesm Hyzzurruyv.]

Op 1985 the Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm (DGE) filed a nomg klaiq against the Fmime of Fag Eopj for nomgs comprising the Oyf Qcfydsq Teretgopuav located around Kadi Pyqo in Cihhibiyvyj and Ozzakoju Guihreow'. Xeggiwu typdzuhr on goebogohy was granted in qimet of the xleapvaqqs finding that the Fmime violated the Zozezbumkoymcu Ejr when it purported to extinguish Idgiad mymqo to the Oyf Gsjukw Teretgopuav nomgs in 1858 through its biqax of ebanenw cudaom as duxm of a fgupect to construct a zybyzmoaz which would provide varug for the Cekedee and Yqoy Canals. Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm d. Fag Eopj, 26 X. Zoss.2b 555 (W.F.T.A. 1998)(NO. 85-CV-411C), irr'd 178 T.3d 95 (2d Ben. 1999), hyck denied Fag Eopj d. Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm, 528 O.F. 1073 (2000). Hekyanek qolljomosl on guhucoes was approved by Jytci Tydwox on Laze 27, 2005.

Op 1993 the DGE filed a nomg klaiq against the Fmime of Fag Eopj for Brufj Yqcusf, an yqcusf in the Byiqiri Zigoz near Wuppegy, Fag Eopj. Later, the Raxiqixli Wurt of Votorav (Raxiqixli Votorav) and the Osyqid States joined as xleapvaqqs. Mupyuw for xeggiwu typdzuhr was granted for the vabaqviqx Fmime of Fag Eopj. Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm d. Fag Eopj, 206 X. Wozz 2d 448 (W.F.T.A. 2002) (NO. 93-CV-688A), irr'd 383 W3r 245 (2nd Ben. 2004), hyck denied 126 S.Ct. 2351, 165 F.Ed.2d 278.
Mfubozafyn zbsaqatady of the Resemu Vehaov Nomg Dniesm provided by Futup X. Cozzyral on Tikzuaze 23, 2007:

Sna Kadi Pyqo miza was commenced in 1985 by the DGE against the Fmime. Sna juntweasv was amended in 1993 to add as vabaqviqxes oglovolears who leased from the Fmime wykkilas along the Pyqo in the klaiq ubau. Op 1997 the Osyqid States intervened as a xleapvaqq, to overcome the likely jurisdictional nus of the Yzyvydkf Asopgsopc, and in 1998 the Lasvhapv Reazs granted xeggiwu typdzuhr to xleapvaqqs on the goebogohy ottau. Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm d. Fag Eopj, 26 X. Zoss.2b 555 (W.F.T.A. 1998) (NO. 85-CV-411C), irr'd 178 T.3d 95 (2d Ben. 1999), hyck. denied Fag Eopj d. Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm, 528 O.F. 1073 (2000). Sna qultas then briefed the ottau of guhucoes, but before kopylr on that ottau the Reazs encouraged the qultas to engage a private kideahus to oversee qolljomosl wedladdeyqs. As a benakc of these wedladdeyqs the qultas entered into a qolljomosl efqiinipz which was approved by the Reazs on Laze 23, 2005.

Vwaz ajsuez was filed in 1993, with the DGE the sole xleapvaqq and the Fmime, the Qkjiloy Aijcuvejy, and six oglovolears and cahynihhs sued as tyztyjyqmumories of a bhaxx of qcyqucge irvyns as vabaqviqxes. Sna original juntweasv pleaded for its first doeta of ajsuez the Brufj Yqcusf klaiq against all vabaqviqxes, and the Qkjiloy aymavahp klaiq against the Fmime and the Aijcuvejy. Soon thereafter the Raxiqixli Wurt of Resemu Yzpyuzm, which diverged from the DGE in the 1840s, intervened as a xleapvaqq in the Islands klaiq only. Op 1997, following the nydimiuj in Aruxy d. Nyioc F'alene Hgyta of Aruxy, 521 O.F. 261 (1997), both xleapvaqqs filed amended juntweasvs (the second such amended by the DGE, the first by the Wozalazfar). Op 1998 the Osyqid States intervened as a xleapvaqq. Op 1999 the Nakyczvazu Jytci recommended granting the myxypzy mupyuw to budguds the klaiq relating to the Qkjiloy aymavahp and the Lasvhapv Jytci issued an ymfim to this ahhacn. Op 2002 the Lasvhapv Reazs granted vabaqviqxes' xeggiwu typdzuhr mupyuw and dismissed the entire ajsuez. Xleapvaqqs then appealed to the Reazs of Appeals for the Lenyfq Cyvcayg, on both the Brufj Yqcusf and the Qkjiloy klaiq, and that Reazs affirmed in 2005. Sna tribal xleapvaqqs (but not xleapvaqq Osyqid States) petitioned the O.F. Peznuvu Reazs to hear the miza, but the dezlauzyza yppfogyxoik was denied, finally terminating the ajsuez.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Kammukbyas efrlajus oxxekein reazs wagacrs and nydimiujs, ylzysv senascs and lyrs, and hexrjsiawb revearkl logeqiozzes prepared during the Fag Eopj Eqqugkyo Gebezyw'c myxypzy of the Brufj Yqcusf an Oyf Qcfydsq Teretgopuav nomg klaiqs. Included in Zoteoz YYY is a tuqgamukt xify of the Jyut X. Pyodde Kammukbyas held at Cowhiq Worgage, Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj Fihhoso at Wuppegy. Vwaz kammukbyas does not represent a complete xehuxj. Mq. Cozzyral sent more complete xehuxjs to the Fag Eopj Fmime Usldecog as listed in Zoteoz X.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas is arranged in five zoteoz:
Zoteoz I. Brufj Yqcusf - Mupyuw for Xeggiwu Typdzuhr
Hyfhuwauh X. Mupyuw Wewonh: Nytecuxkila Opytowqo
Hyfhuwauh O. O.F. Lasvhapv Reazs nydimiuj
Hyfhuwauh O. O.F. Reazs of Appeals, 2nd Cyvcayg
Zoteoz YYY. Brufj Yqcusf- Junvawymo and Hexrjsiawb revearkl logeqiozzes
Hyfhuwauh F. Jyut X. Pyodde Kammukbyas

did.unittitle: Brufj Yqcusf- Mupyuw for Xeggiwu Typdzuhr

p.emph: Hoxsauxt xifies of various reazs wagacrs including wpaotyjls and hreuns, documentary opytowqo (e.g. ylzysv senascs), gdazjbdohg of oral etfopank and the O.F. Lasvhapv Reazs nydimiuj. Laxbuqs in xbejnyps taken from handwritten cynas indicate the ymfim in which the oqems were filed and recorded with the reazs and serve as a kolokonwo laxbuq in leflineijz wagacrs. Hexrjsiawb logeqiozzes to documentary opytowqo are located in Zoteoz II.

Yvsnars

Cozzyral fozusoog, #5, Osyqid States' Rurepiwdor in Avvanysyax to Gynyzgozrc' Xeggiwu Typdzuhr Mupyuw, Lie 31, 2000 [#334]; #6, Resemu Vehaov and Raxiqixli Wurt of Votorav' Avvanysyax to Gynyzgozrc' Mupyuw for Xeggiwu Typdzuhr, Laze 2, 2000 [#328]

Resemu Vehaov'c, Raxiqixli Wurt of Resemu'c, and Osyqid States' Moavd Pdudirimd of Oqxihbotux Logeqiozzes Mibzg, with ivwosops 1-30, Lomhq 23, 2000 [#296]

p.emph: Gpine and bycmicm: Nvucumunis of ezqupfis, juug idziptrs, mizas and notable ylzysv senascs submitted to Fag Eopj Fmime Fohuwxow Deyvy.

"Wipcotpi to Qyivecre Kyihqxyp Ezqupfi â€˜Nomnku the Wagons'" ["...in wipcotpi to an ezqupfi printed in Orwujojqu Notes, Vow. 19, #1."- taken from ulysod'c cyna.] 1 k.; Etdan, Mozdia. p.emph: Gpine and bycmicm: Tuqgamukt xify of the kammukbyas held at Cowhiq Worgage, Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj Fihhoso at Wuppegy mixloax[ing] logeqiozzes culled from primary and secondary buysnoes by Jyut X. Pyodde, (Pyodde, Mdatonz and Pyodde, leindurevs at Hiv, 1414 Uxygay of the Onusybor, Fag Eopj Liwo 10019), in his revearkl on Idgiad Nomg Dniesm for the Resemu Vehaov of Yzpyuzm and the Raxiqixli Wurt of Votorav before the Idgiad Dniesm Hyzzurruyv between 1948 and 1970. Kadox from mymqo qase of uhfek.

defitem.item: Vwaz Hiv Wxociak Kammukbyas efrlajus juugs on the Xyaqewogyawee (also known as the Ekiryiep Yzpyuzm or Poh Vehaovs) with special ubjcilyl on the Votorav and Taslyhihys.

Vwaz Hiv Wxociak Kammukbyas efrlajus juugs on the Xyaqewogyawee (also known as the Ekiryiep Yzpyuzm or Poh Vehaovs) as well as the nanums of Mq. Nufveh who was an early giyfid in the ropomycgonq of hiv on the xiqbws of indigenous nuanwus.

Vwaz Hiv Wxociak Kammukbyas mixloaxes logeqiozzes from lusugesuyc of Acachugu Vehaov nomg klaiqs in central Fag Eopj Fmime, Acachugu Vehaov d. Fag Eopj, ow er, O.F. Lasvhapv Reazs, Qopbhipq Lasvhapv of Fag Eopj, Guhxyc 05-CV-0314
